oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crayon print of Pvt. Joseph I. Mahar
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Crayon print of Pvt. Joseph I. Mahar, Co. F, 13th Ill. Cav., USA. A Hardin County, Tennessee native, from Coffee Landing less than 10 miles from Shiloh, Mahar served in the U. S. Navy aboard the U.S.S. Tyler, and took part in the battles of Ft. Henry and and Ft. Donelson. Discharged from the Navy in March 1862 after contracting measles, Mahar enlisted as a private in Co. F, 13th Ill. Cav., USA, in Dec. 1863 and served in Arkansas until the outfit was disbanded on August 31, 1865.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mahar, Joseph I.
